segments.text: We finally get a chance to meet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for meeting me here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need to speak with you about your daughter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I enjoy having your daughter in my class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She is a great addition to my class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You don't have anything bad to say about her ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She is always behaving herself , and she's so smart .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am so happy that she's doing okay .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm more than happy having her in my class .
segments.speaker: S2
